name: eon-ticket
effect: Provides access to southern island and either latias or latios, whichever is not available roaming around Hoenn.
short_effect: Provides access to Southern Island and Latias or Latios.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The ticket required for sailing on a ferry to the Southern Island. Does Norman, the Petalburg Gym Leader, know a secret?!
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The ticket required for sailing on a ferry to the Southern Island. Does Norman, the Petalburg Gym Leader, know a secret?!
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The ticket required for sailing on a ferry to the Southern Island. Does Norman, the Petalburg Gym Leader, know a secret?!
